fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Baby Blue symbolizes trustworthiness, reliability, and tranquility. Baby Blue can visit a player to convince them to tell Baby Blue their role, through the emotions listed.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - As Baby Blue learns roles through verbal communication from the target, modifications to what the target would appear as from a role not affiliated with your target will fail, but modifications from a role that is affiliated with your target will not.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Paint the Town into a rainbow!
